name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure - Collectors Edition
summary:
One sunny day brave Hercules was resting in his hammock and cooking delicious donuts. He dozed off just for a few minutes but it was enough for the hero's brunch to burn to a crisp. All the dreams of a starving Hercules were ruined. What should he do? There was a way. Hercules decided to turn back time, and move the clock's hand back with all his might. What could possibly go wrong? Obviously, everything!

The collector's edition contains additional bonus levels, a guide, and wallpapers.
